China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 22 日星期一 10:41:05 GMT 120
China's residential foreclosures increase 43% in 2023The number of foreclosed homes in China rose 43% year-on-year in 2023, according to a private survey on Monday, highlighting a worrying trend of rising mortgage delinquencies amid a sustained property market slump and a patchy economic recovery. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 10:17:18 GMT 2WQXQCTZQVNIHED6SDLKG5RCNE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-residential-foreclosures-increase-43-2023-2024-01-22/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Beijing sets 2024 growth target higher despite slowing economyChina's capital city Beijing has set a growth target of around 5% for 2024, surpassing last year's target of above 4.5%, despite expectations of slower growth for the national economy. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 09:57:45 GMT RDPUJCZ5DBM63AAGAJL6COQXHQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/beijing-sets-2024-growth-target-higher-despite-slowing-economy-2024-01-22/Reuters市场宏观问题
China, in comic strip, warns of 'overseas' threats to its rare earthsChina's chief intelligence agency posted on social media a comic strip featuring foreign-looking characters secretly extracting rare earths, in a story portraying the country's strategic metals under threat from covetous "overseas organisations". Mon, 22 Jan 2024 09:30:01 GMT OUJQ7WRP7NOGTKFYGRVN6HCCBU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-comic-strip-warns-overseas-threats-its-rare-earths-2024-01-22/Liz Lee世界中国
German exports to US, China fall sharply in DecemberExports to Germany's most important overseas trade partners, including the United States and China, fell significantly at the end of last year, according to statistics office data on Monday. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 09:29:43 GMT JJ5WPB7KERNJ5OSJK7MXFWL2TA https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/german-exports-us-china-fall-sharply-december-2024-01-22/Reuters市场欧洲市场
Country Garden's offshore bondholders pick Kirkland for debt revamp talks - sourceA major group of Country Garden offshore creditors has appointed Kirkland & Ellis LLP as the legal adviser, a source familiar with the matter said, in a move towards discussing debt repayment options with the defaulted Chinese developer. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 09:12:04 GMT YXACGDAYNZIV5DJBZQWKWNYRUQ https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/country-gardens-offshore-bondholders-pick-kirkland-debt-revamp-talks-source-2024-01-22/Reuters商业金融
Analysts see Russian fuel complex resuming operations within weeks after suspected drone attackRussian energy company Novatek is likely to resume large-scale operations at its Ust-Luga processing complex and Baltic Sea terminal within weeks, after a fire started by what Ukrainian media said was a drone attack, analysts said on Monday. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 09:06:16 GMT 4UVOZIT4XNINPHDRBPAJLHMJGY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/analysts-see- Russian-fuel-complex-resuming-operations-within-weeks-after-2024-01-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Taiwan Dec export orders in worst fall in 6 months, outlook poorTaiwan's export orders fell more than expected in their worst performance in six months in December, with the outlook for the island's high-tech products remaining poor due to growing doubts about global economic growth. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 08:59:08 GMT WRSXVXS3XJNEHAJTYTMS65CQGY https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/taiwan-dec-export-orders-worst-fall-6-months-outlook-poor-2024-01-22/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Exclusive: China moves to support yuan as stock markets tumbleChina's major state-owned banks moved to support the yuan on Monday, tightening liquidity in the offshore foreign exchange market while actively selling U.S. dollars onshore as equities slid, four sources with knowledge of the matter said. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 08:44:15 GMT ZN7KZO75OJJWTI7754CL3OXBBY https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/china-moves-support-yuan-stock-markets-tumble-sources-2024-01-22/Reuters市场宏观问题
China vows judicial disclosure after outcry over plan to curb access to rulingsChina's top court has pledged to "deepen judicial disclosure" after its plan to curtail access to court decisions faced unusual public criticism from lawyers and legal experts. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 08:10:02 GMT FUAPZ3SLLFO6PGRSOGND5745EE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-vows-judicial-disclosure-after-outcry-over-plan-curb-access-rulings-2024-01-22/Laurie Chen世界中国
Novatek's Ust-Luga Baltic Sea fuel complex under attackRussian energy company Novatek on Sunday was forced to suspend some operations at Ust-Luga, a huge Baltic Sea fuel export terminal and processing complex, due to a fire started by what Ukrainian media said was a drone attack. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 07:24:16 GMT N5ITRB44HNM7TCPKZRKFEA3TKQ https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/novateks-ust-luga-baltic-sea-fuel-complex-under-attack-2024-01-22/Reuters商业活力
